settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

settings.subtitle: Got Questions?
settings.title: We've Got Answers
settings.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll be happy to help!

settings.question: What are the main ingredients in your products?
settings.answer: Our products contain a unique blend of amino acids, keratin, natural plant extracts (like argan oil and aloe vera), and essential vitamins (B5, E) that work together to strengthen and beautify your hair from root to tip.

settings.question: How often should I use the treatment?
settings.answer: For best results, we recommend using our intensive treatment products 2-3 times per week. Our daily care products like shampoo and conditioner can be used with every wash. Adjust based on your hair type and needs.

settings.question: Are your products safe for colored hair?
settings.answer: Yes! All our products are color-safe and sulfate-free. They actually help protect and extend the life of your hair color by sealing the cuticle and preventing color fade.

settings.question: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide! Standard international shipping takes 7-14 business days. Express options are available at checkout. All orders include tracking.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your purchase, contact us within 30 days for a full refund or exchange. Products should be unused or minimally used.

settings.question: Are your products tested on animals?
settings.answer: No! We are proudly cruelty-free. We never test our products or ingredients on animals. We believe beautiful hair shouldn't come at the cost of animal welfare.

settings.question: Can I use your products on chemically treated hair?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Our products are formulated to be gentle yet effective on all hair types, including chemically treated, relaxed, permed, and keratin-treated hair.

settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also log into your account to view order status, or contact us if you need help.

settings.question: Do you offer wholesale or salon pricing?
settings.answer: Yes! We partner with salons and beauty professionals. Contact us with your business information to learn about our wholesale program and special pricing.

settings.question: What makes Angel Hair different from other brands?
settings.answer: Our products are formulated by hair care experts using premium amino acids and natural extracts. We focus on actually repairing and strengthening hair, not just coating it. Plus, our products are cruelty-free, sulfate-free, and made with love.

settings.question: How should I store the products?
settings.answer: Store products in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep containers tightly closed when not in use. Most products have a 2-year shelf life when properly stored.
